https://openminds.om-i.org/props/elevati._instruction: Enter the elevation of the location in metres, following the definitions of the WGS84 system.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/elevati.label: Elevation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/elevati.name: elevation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/latitud._instruction: Enter the latitude of the location in decimal degrees, following the definitions of the WGS84 system.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/latitud.label: Latitude
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/latitud.name: latitude

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/longitu._instruction: Enter the longitude of the location in decimal degrees, following the definitions of the WGS84 system.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/longitu.label: Longitude
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/longitu.name: longitude
